title: S1 Ep70: India's school assessments fail the reliability test
itunes:title: India's school assessments fail the reliability test
description: In India, tests intended to evaluate overall student achievement, soon to be rolled out nationally, suffer from massive grade inflation - even though no children or teachers are rewarded or punished based on the results. Ahbijeet Singh tells Tim Phillips why this happens and how we can collect more reliable administrative data in future.
